name: Revenge of the Snowman
description:
You wake up in a suspicious house, after a while you notice that there is no one in it, but there is blood everywhere.
You have to find the keys as soon as possible and escape from the killer snowman.

Good luck!

CONTROLS

-MOVE WASD

-OPEN/COLLECT  LEFT MOUSE CLICK

Flashlight F

The game was done in two days.

Contains jumpscars
